title: The Volunteers
description: Eryk finds out that a girl he likes, D W-B, is in a gang. He decides to check it out. Trouble ensues. Eryk gets beat up, but it turns out it's worth it. D W-B would meet him at his locker. Sometimes he couldn't even speak, staring at the freckles on her nose. She was the most beautiful thing he'd ever seen.Yeah, you got no business being in love if you're just fifteen.
author: John Blandly
